oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt from Matt Pylkas Oral History Interview, 2011 August 09
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Excerpt from an oral history interview with Matt Pylkas, conducted on August 09, 2011 by Susannah Gibbons as part of the Flood 2010 Digital History Project. Lt. Pylkas describes his rescue of two women stranded in the water and tangled in a barb-wire fence in West Nashville.
The complete interview is available in the Special Collections Division.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Pylkas, Matt--Interviews
